Stable diffusion for code generation? No, it's STP - a self-play theorem prover 🧠💡 #AIResearch #LLMEnhancements
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.00212
Scientific Theory Prioritization (STP) 🧪🚀 improves AI research through diverse conjectures and self-play training, scaling with complexity. #AIResearch #Innovation
Model excels on benchmarks like LeanWorkbook, miniF2F-test, and PutnamBench 🚀#AIAdvancements #PerformanceMetrics
Drum roll 🥁 STP advances automated theorem proving with self-play training and self-improvement. #AIResearch #TheoremProving 🧠🚀
